name: date-preview
description: Preview date time as your desired time zone.

date-preview.detect.ISO-8601String.markdownDescription: Whether to detect [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format date string.

date-preview.detect.epochTimestamp.description: Whether to detect Epoch timestamp. Currently supports seconds and millonseconds.

date-preview.localPreview.format.markdownDescription: Local timezone date preview format, described in [day.js format documentation](https://day.js.org/docs/en/display/format). Leave empty to use ISO-8601 format.

name.description: Show as name in preview window.

format.description: Used to format date display. Leave empty to use ISO-8601 format.

utcOffset.description: UTC offset of custom preview timezone. If the input is between -16 and -16, it will be interpreted as hours, otherwise, minutes instead. Leave empty to use local timezone.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
